title: Saka Nakodar Killings: 38 Years Later, An Elderly Man Hopes For Justice Within His Lifetime
selftext: Part of a judicial inquiry into the extrajudicial killings containing significant evidence and sworn statements has remained missing. Meanwhile, the X (formerly Twitter) account devoted to campaigning for justice in the case has been taken down by the Union government.
